email.subject: Oozie failure for dp_enterprise.demo_offer_outreach_tx DAILY for ${TODAY_DATE}
email.body:
Bundle bundle-uds_offer_outreach_external_resource : Coordinator coordinator-demo_offer_outreach_tx : Workflow workflow-demo_offer_outreach_tx
This is a result of a main workflow failure. It is required to restart this coordinator from the begining. Do not restart the workflow.
Follow the instructions below:
1. Query the coordinator_id that failed to obtain the most current action_id with the following: oozie job -info _coordinator_id_ -verbose
2. Restart a coordinator with the following: oozie job -rerun _coordinator_id_ -action _action_id_
The dp_enterprise.demo_offer_outreach_tx process for ${TODAY_DATE} with id ${wf:id()} failed with message: [${wf:errorMessage(wf:lastErrorNode())}]
